com.researchspace.repository.spi

Interface IRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StubRepositoryImpl

    public interface IRepository
    Top level interface for data repository integration. This is loosely an an abstraction over our repository implementations - Dataverse, Figshare and DSpace.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IRepository NULL_OPS
      Null implementation that does nothing, but avoids the need for null-checks when using in a test environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(RepositoryConfig config)
      Perform any configuration on the repository object by clients
      RepositoryConfigurer getConfigurer()
      Gets an object to help configure the repository submission.
      RepositoryOperationResult submitDeposit(IDepositor depositor, java.io.File toDeposit, SubmissionMetadata metadata, RepositoryConfig repoCfg)
      Performs the submission of the deposit
      RepositoryOperationResult testConnection()
      Should be a read-only, quick operation that verifies connection to the repository

    • Field Detail

      • NULL_OPS

        static final IRepository NULL_OPS
        Null implementation that does nothing, but avoids the need for null-checks when using in a test environment.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(RepositoryConfig config)
        Perform any configuration on the repository object by clients
        Parameters:
        config - A RepositoryConfig

      • submitDeposit

        RepositoryOperationResult submitDeposit(IDepositor depositor,
                                        java.io.File toDeposit,
                                        SubmissionMetadata metadata,
                                        RepositoryConfig repoCfg)
        Performs the submission of the deposit
        Parameters:
        depositor - the User performing the deposit
        toDeposit - the file to deposit to the archive
        metadata - a SubmissionMetadata
        Throws:
        RepositoryDepositException - - wraps any low level implementation exception.

      • testConnection

        RepositoryOperationResult testConnection()
        Should be a read-only, quick operation that verifies connection to the repository
        Returns:
        A success message if connection is OK
        Throws:
        a - runtime IllegalStateException if connection not OK

      • getConfigurer

        RepositoryConfigurer getConfigurer()
        Gets an object to help configure the repository submission.
        Returns:
